content:
Sabhaye! Ninnude vishvaasam
Shari thanne saubhaagyam the!
Mrthi ninneprathi poondavanil
Pukazhunnabhimaanatthaal nee.

nirmmalayaakki vasicheedum
Ninmanavaallan mashihaayil
Sammodikkuka shuddhasabhe!
Ninre virunnu tharunnimpam.

Pedakamodoppam palllli-thronosu thalpeedham
Mashihaaye shushrooshikkum-pattakkaariyarkkaavos?
Shilpikall keeppaa pauloosum-kurilosu seveereyum
Nirmmithameeyasposaalum nirmmala neelakkallaalum.
